column4: hello all, I'm wondering if there is an application out there that is a uPnP media server and has the ability to connect to Hulu, CBS, netflix etc... for ubuntu? I'm looking for something like PlayOn but open source or GPL.
I know Ps3Mediaserver does at least Youtube... not sure what else it can do
thanks, I'll check into that. I hadn't heard of that one.
apparently it doesn't have Hulu or netflix support. Does anyone elseh ave any other suggestions?
